column4: hi, I forgot root password , but have a user account which is not sudo user
and put a new password instead on x ?
no, you have to use a live-cd and chroot to your partition, then do passwd.
as I said, boot with a live-cd, sudo su in terminal, then mount /dev/sda1 /mnt;chroot /mnt   and lastly passwd, set new root password.
